name: Digital Star 2048
description:
A 2048 number combination puzzle game. Simple game play that you can play with the character of your choice.
Reach the highest Score and collect the Stars. Get 2048 to collect Trophy.

 FEATURE

Current features..

- Arcade Mode 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 - Collect Stars and Trophy

Available languages
- INDONESIA
- ENGLISH

CONTROL

FOR WINDOWS

Left, Right, Up, Down - To Move the Tile / or Slide the Screen
Use Mouse for Navigate MENU.

FOR ANDROID

Just slide screen to move Tile.
An Touch the Menu to Select

INFO

*Story mode is still under development **Game is still under development. All input is very helpful.
If you want to download on PlayStore, here's the link!

THIS GAME DESAIN FOR SMART PHONE.
FOR PC, THE DISPLAY IS NOT FULL AND A 1080P RESOLUTION MONITOR IS RECOMMENDED.
OR USE A MONITOR THAT CAN BE PLAYED ON THE SCREEN.
